sense.def: Alternative Names die pu sun shang 跌扑損傷 ; cuo die sun shang 蹉跌損傷 ; die ke shang sun 跌磕傷損 ; die sun 跌損 ; die pu 跌扑 , [injuries resulting from] falls; die pu zhe shang 跌扑折傷 , fractures and [further] injuries from falls; die pu zhe shang 跌仆折傷 . Pathological Condition of bodily injuries resulting from a fall. XSLSXDMF Recipe Entry hei long san 黑龍散 , black dragon powder: 治跌扑傷損，筋骨碎斷，差爻出臼 , “It cures injuries from falls , ruptured sinews and bone fractures, as well as dislocations”.
